summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TwinMCP landing page with animations and conversion optimization features. Most features working correctly with one minor issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Free trial popup does not appear after 3 seconds as expected
ui_bugs.details: The popup component exists in code but timer mechanism may not be triggering properly

design_issues.issue: Animated counters show 0 values instead of expected numbers (5000+, 500+, 95%, 10x)
design_issues.details: Animation may need intersection observer trigger or counter values not properly set

passed_tests: Landing page loads correctly with TwinMCP branding
Hero section displays with animated CTA buttons (Essai Gratuit 14 Jours, Voir la DÃ©mo)
Comparison section Free vs Pro displays with features table and CTA
Pricing section shows all 3 plans (Free, Professional, Enterprise)
Professional plan is highlighted with ESSAI GRATUIT badge and 'Le plus populaire' label
Stats section displays with 4 animated counter placeholders
Testimonials section displays with 3 company testimonials (DevStudio, AI Solutions, TechFlow)
Final CTA section is visible and functional
All CTA buttons are clickable and properly styled
Features section displays 4 main features with proper styling
Animations and visual effects are implemented (6 animation classes, 15 gradient elements, 18 hover effects)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix free trial popup timer mechanism to ensure it appears after 3 seconds. Verify animated counter values are properly set to display actual numbers instead of 0.
